body.para: On Fri, 2006-05-26 at 17:15 -0400, Alex Maier wrote:

quote.quotepara: Yes indeed the headers were not designed to perfectly fit in the wiki as it is now, but with the wiki redesign and migration in mind, please see the PSD layout delivered with further design improvements to make the web pages look and feel closer to the Fedora GUI.

body.para: Where is the PSD layout delivered?
